title: 07/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/15/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Suns should still feel good about their chances to win the NBA Championship despite the Bucks tying up the series. He believes it’s time for Aaron Rodgers to accept some culpability for his role in the standoff between him and the Packers organization. He also shares his 2021 predictions for the NFC and why Tom Brady and the Buccaneers are set up for another season of domination. Plus, NFL Insider Kevin Clark joins the show to give the latest on Rodgers and if he will return to the Packers this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
